```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(modelr)
set.seed(1)
```

# Generate a relevant example 
```{r}
n_samp = 250

sim_df_const = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(n_samp, 1,1),
    error = rnorm(n_samp,0,1),
    y = 2 + 3 * x + error
  )

sim_df_nonconst = 
  sim_df_const |>
  mutate(error = error *.75 *x,
         y = 2 + 3 *x + error)

sim_df_const|>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point()
```
